name: Comic Life 2 Layout File
summary: Learn about .CL2LYT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Many different panel layouts are supplied with the Comic Life 2 software. You can access them from the "Panel Layouts" panel in Comic Life 2.

description: File used by Comic Life 2, a comic book authoring application; stores the panel layout structure for a document page; allows comic book pages to have the boxes that separate dialogue and scenes in the story progression.
